item.title: 英国计划禁止无牌照博彩运营商参与体育博彩
item.description: 英国正考虑禁止无牌照博彩运营商赞助英国体育队伍，包括英超足球俱乐部，此举是更大范围打击黑市赌博、保护消费者权益的举措之一。【原文：The UK is considering barring unlicensed gambling operators from sponsoring UK sports teams including Premier League football clubs as part of a broader effort to rein in black-market gambling and protect consumers.】

item.title: 高盛称对冲基金抛售全球股票规模创四月以来新高
item.description: 高盛集团Prime服务台交易员称，对冲基金全球股票净抛售规模已达到2025年4月初关税危机以来的最高水平。【原文：Hedge funds’ net sales of global stocks reached the fastest pace since the tariff meltdown of early April 2025, according to traders on Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s Prime Services Desk.】

item.title: 欧盟枢纽站自新俄罗斯制裁开始以来首次获得印度燃料
item.description: 一艘载有印度柴油的油轮已停靠欧洲最大港口，此次到港颇为引人注目——此前部分贸易商曾对违反针对购买俄罗斯原油制成品的新制裁表示担忧。【原文：A tanker carrying diesel from India has moored in Europe’s largest port, a notable arrival after some traders had expressed caution about falling foul of new sanctions on buying fuel made from Russian crude.】

item.title: 美联储沃勒称三月加息决定取决于劳动力市场状况
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗·沃勒表示，他是否支持在下次政策会议上降息的决定，将取决于即将公布的劳动力市场数据。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said his decision on whether to support an interest-rate cut at the US central bank’s next policy meeting will hinge on upcoming labor-market data.】

item.title: 古德沃特与卡谢克领投面向"无固定工位员工"的人力资源应用Humand
item.description: 初创公司Humand押注下一波办公软件浪潮将不再瞄准办公室职员，而是面向数十亿不坐在电脑前的劳动者。【原文：Startup Humand is betting the next wave of workplace software won’t target office employees but the billions of workers who don’t sit behind a computer.】

item.title: 美国盘前活跃股：Arcellx、达美乐、MoonLake、Vanda、Veris
item.description: 截至纽约时间上午7:45，标普500指数期货下跌0.4%，因美国贸易政策的不确定性笼罩市场情绪。本周关键事件包括：周二特朗普总统的国情咨文演讲、周三英伟达财报发布以及周五生产者物价指数数据公布。【原文：S&P 500 Index futures decline 0.4% as of 7:45 a.m. in New York as uncertainty over American trade policy clouds sentiment. Key events this week include President Donald Trump’s State of the Union Address Tuesday, Nvidia earnings on Wednesday and PPI data on Friday.】

item.title: 油价持续上涨取决于伊朗紧张局势冲击供应
item.description: 去年对德黑兰的压力升级时，价格确实上涨了，但涨幅很快回落。【原文：When the pressure on Tehran escalated last year, prices did rise, but the surge faded quickly.】

item.title: 孟加拉国新政府计划修订阿达尼电力协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，孟加拉国计划与印度阿达尼电力公司重新谈判购电协议，以争取更低电价。这是上周新政府上台后推出的首批举措之一。【原文：Bangladesh plans to renegotiate its power purchase deal with India’s Adani Power Ltd. in order to seek lower prices, according to people familiar with the matter, marking one of the newly elected government’s first initiatives since taking office last week.】

item.title: 2025年墨西哥经济增长乏力 舍恩鲍姆积极吸引更多投资
item.description: 2025年，墨西哥经济连续第四年放缓，该国正努力吸引更多投资，同时面临巨额预算赤字和持续的贸易不确定性。【原文：Mexico’s economy slowed for a fourth consecutive year in 2025, as the country struggles to attract more investment and faces down both a large budget deficit and grinding trade uncertainty.】

item.title: 受西方制裁影响，俄罗斯原油价格创2023年以来最大跌幅
item.description: 俄罗斯旗舰原油在国际市场上的交易价格已跌至近三年来的最大折扣，因西方制裁阻碍了与莫斯科的贸易往来。【原文：Russia’s flagship crude is selling at the deepest discount in the international marketplace in almost three years as western sanctions deter trade with Moscow.】

item.title: 英格兰银行利率制定者泰勒称特朗普关税政策"将长期存在"
item.description: 英格兰银行利率制定者艾伦·泰勒表示，美国关税对全球贸易和英国通胀造成的冲击波将持续多年，同时他淡化了上周最高法院对特朗普总统标志性经济政策作出不利裁决的影响。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Alan Taylor said the shock waves from US tariffs on global trade and UK inflation will play over many years as he played down last week’s Supreme Court ruling against President Donald Trump’s signature economic policy.】

item.title: 西非油价受高运费及价差影响重挫
item.description: 西非原油贸易商正被迫大幅降价，原因是运费飙升以及不利的价格差削弱了亚洲买家对该地区货物的需求。【原文：West African crude traders are being forced into offering deep discounts by soaring freight costs and an unfavorable price spread that is eroding Asian buyers’ appetite for the region’s cargoes.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利分析师亚当斯称，瑞士法郎或将飙升17%，其价值堪比黄金
item.description: 摩根士丹利策略师表示，在面对美国政策不确定性之际，市场对瑞士法郎避险属性的信心日益增强，该货币兑美元汇率可能飙升多达17%。【原文：The Swiss franc could surge as much as 17% to the dollar amid growing confidence in the currency’s haven status in the face of US policy uncertainty, according to Morgan Stanley strategists.】

item.title: 石油巨头就50亿美元哈萨克斯坦硫磺罚款寻求仲裁
item.description: 壳牌公司表示，运营哈萨克斯坦第二大油田卡沙甘的石油巨头已就与政府50亿美元环境罚款纠纷提起国际仲裁。【原文：The oil majors that operate Kazakhstan’s second-largest field, Kashagan, have filed for international arbitration of their dispute with the government over a $5 billion environmental fine, according to Shell Plc.】

item.title: 迈阿密最新热潮的根源在于硅谷
item.description: 部分科技领袖和企业抛却故土，集体迁往南佛罗里达州【原文：Some tech leaders and companies cast off ties to home in exodus to South Florida】

item.title: 特朗普的新关税面临自身法律问题
item.description: 特朗普宣布美国面临"国际收支"危机，并宣布对全球商品加征15%关税【原文：The US faces a “balance of payments” crisis, Trump declares in invoking new 15% global tariffs】

item.title: 特朗普关税政策失利为"严苛"替代方案敞开大门
item.description: 特朗普政府仍可对贸易伙伴施加诸多压力手段【原文：The Trump administration still has plenty of levers to use against its trade partners】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰的困境笼罩着私募信贷的前景
item.description:
当投资者无法撤回资金时，不透明资产就更难推销了。【原文：

Opaque assets become a tougher sell when investors can’t pull their cash out.

】

item.title: 诺和诺德试验失败引发丹麦股市震荡
item.description: 诺和诺德公司令人失望的业绩数据在丹麦股市引发震荡，拖累整体市场走低，凸显该国经济与这家肥胖症药物制造商的紧密关联。【原文：Disappointing data from Novo Nordisk A/S is sending shockwaves across equities in Denmark, dragging the wider market down and underscoring how tightly the country’s fortunes are tied to the obesity-drug maker.】

item.title: 中国获益，特朗普被迫调整关税政策
item.description: 习近平主席将于下月接待美国同行，而这位美国同行突然失去了其惯用的施压手段。【原文：President Xi will host a US counterpart next month who has been suddenly denied his favored means of leverage.】

item.title: 美国人对牛排情有独钟，无论代价多高
item.description:
牛肉价格创历史新高。新型经济实惠的部位正满足市场需求。【原文：

Beef prices are at an-all time high. New budget-friendly cuts are meeting demand.

】

item.title: 千禧退出催生两家新对冲基金，筹资目标达14亿美元
item.description: 在千禧管理公司去年终止创始人此前管理的基金后，两只新商品对冲基金正寻求共同募集14亿美元资产。【原文：Two new commodities hedge funds are seeking to raise a collective $1.4 billion in assets after Millennium Management pulled the plug on the founders’ previous fund last year.】

item.title: 雅诗兰黛首席执行官称公司正寻求并购机会以助扭亏为盈
item.description: 雅诗兰黛集团正积极寻求收购机会，这家拥有乔·马龙和Le Labo品牌的母公司正进入首席执行官斯蒂芬·德拉法维里领导的转型计划第二年。【原文：Estée Lauder Cos. is open to acquisitions as the owner of the Jo Malone and Le Labo brands enters the second year of a turnaround plan under Chief Executive Officer Stéphane de La Faverie.】

item.title: 卫星运营商欧洲卫星通信公司寻求15亿欧元债务再融资
item.description: 欧洲通信卫星公司正寻求筹集15亿欧元（约合18亿美元），这家卫星公司计划在政府救助后对未偿债务进行再融资。【原文：Eutelsat Communications SA is seeking to raise €1.5 billion ($1.8 billion) as the satellite company looks to refinance outstanding debt after government rescue.】

item.title: 另类指标显示：富豪担忧中透出股市看涨信号
item.description: 尽管推动美国股市的因素众多——从人工智能到关税问题的新不确定性，再到地缘政治焦虑——但美国消费者的健康状况仍是决定标普500指数能否突破近期波动区间的关键因素。【原文：For all the forces driving the US stock market — from AI to fresh uncertainty on tariffs to geopolitical angst — the health of the American consumer remains a key determinant for whether the S&P 500 Index will break out of its recent range.】

item.title: 卡塔尔贷款机构筹备AT1债券交易，中东地区销售热潮持续升温
item.description: 卡塔尔历史最悠久的私营贷款机构计划发行自2021年以来首只补充一级资本债券，加入该地区众多发行机构行列，共同推出这种高风险银行债务产品。【原文：Qatar’s oldest private lender plans to sell its first Additional Tier 1 bond since 2021 as it joins a spate of issuers offering the risky bank debt in the region.】

item.title: 嘉士伯据悉启动印度子公司7亿美元IPO进程
item.description: 据知情人士透露，嘉士伯集团已任命三家银行，并开始为其印度子公司潜在的上市计划做准备，该计划可能筹集高达7亿美元的资金。【原文：Carlsberg A/S has appointed three banks and begun preparations for a potential listing of its India unit that could raise as much as $700 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度财政部长西塔拉曼称，印度吸引外国资金"完全有理由"
item.description: 印度财政部长尼尔玛拉·西塔拉曼表示，印度吸引外国资金"完全有理由"，尽管在经历数月波动后，海外资金流入仍保持温和态势，且落后于区域内其他国家。【原文：India has “every reason” to attract foreign funds, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said, even as overseas inflows remain modest and lag behind regional peers following months of volatility.】

item.title: NatWest计划在并购推进中实施与商业房地产贷款挂钩的风险转移
item.description: NatWest集团正与投资者商讨发行一项与商业房地产贷款挂钩的大额风险转移工具，此举有望在收购Evelyn Partners计划完成后增强其资本储备。【原文：NatWest Group Plc is in discussions with investors to issue a significant risk transfer tied to commercial real estate loans, a move that could help its capital reserves after a planned acquisition of Evelyn Partners.】

item.title: 印度在关税裁决后对美贸易协议看到更多选择
item.description: 知情人士称，美国最高法院推翻特朗普总统紧急关税的裁决，为印度在贸易协定谈判中提供了更大回旋余地。【原文：The US Supreme Court decision to strike down President Donald Trump’s emergency tariffs gives India more scope in negotiations over a trade deal, people familiar with the matter said.】
